Dozens of officers and soldiers arrived at the scene. The

aman system can confront and attack

Over the past decade, scientists at

mercury in the feathers of the
island's penguins.  King Jor is the closest point in
Antarctica to the Americas. The
United Nations environmental program has issued a warning about the
effects of Mercury on marine mammals. These
animals are at the top of the
food chain, so they are especially susceptible to contamination.
This metal will turn into a
liquid at room temperature according to the
United Nations environmental program. If an
animal consumes Mercury, it may experience reduced
fertility, change in behavior, and

During the first days of the new year, a
large number of people in the province  Khanh Hoa and
Phuong's students came to the snail pagoda in
Cam Ranh city. This is a pagoda with a
unique design made entirely of
shells and shells. The
snail pagoda is located on the campus of
Tu Van pagoda.  On April 3 Street, there
is a 39 m high Relic Tower,
recognized by the Vietnam Record Book as the
tallest relic tower in Vietnam. The snail pagoda was
built of coral stone and decorated with
patterns from thousands of shells.  This
is considered the 102nd pagoda in
Vietnam. This masterpiece is like a terrestrial ocean world
designed and built by hand by the monks of the pagoda
and took nearly 5 years to complete.
With a strong impression of the pagoda, a large number of
people and tourists from all over have come
here to visit and worship, especially during the Lunar New Year.
As guests from all over the country have
come here to admire when they have the opportunity to travel to
